summary: SummaryCeraVe Ultra-Light Moisturizing Gel for all skin types is a lightweight face moisturizer formulated with three essential ceramides, niacinamide & hyaluronic acid to provide lasting hydration with a weightless feel on skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrationSoothesSoftensFeaturesFormula delivers powerful moisturizing ingredients in a refreshing lightweight texture that glides easily onto skin without any tugging or pulling, and spreads evenly. Skin does not feel greasy or sticky after applicationProduct layers well under makeup and SPF and leaves skin feeling softer, soothed, and hydratedFormulated WithoutFragranceOilParabensItem 2611323How To UseApply liberally to face and neck in the morning and at night, or as directed by a physician. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse thoroughly with water. In the morning, follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen. Complete your skincare routine with your favorite CeraVe cleanser and sunscreen!IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Dimethicone, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Triethyl Citrate, Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Xanthan Gum, Phytosphingosine, Benzoic Acid.
how_to_use: Apply liberally to face and neck in the morning and at night, or as directed by a physician. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse thoroughly with water. In the morning, follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen. Complete your skincare routine with your favorite CeraVe cleanser and sunscreen!

reviews.headline: A New Favorite
reviews.comments: I purchased this on a whim out of frustration of not finding a good moisturizer. I used to use La Mer Cooling Gel Cream and then it got replaced. I have been on the search for a replacement ever since. This moisturizing gel is excellent! It absorbs quickly and is still moisturizing enough for my combination skin in the Texas summer heat. It's very lightweight and i can't tell its on. My favorite part is that it does not get sticky throughout the day like other gels. It also does not break me out where I do get oily. I do use a primer, so it keeps my oiliness down. But it works well with it.

reviews.headline: Light and irritating
reviews.comments: Goes on light. However it doesn't feel very hydrating. I have sensitive combination skin. It really irritated my skin, and made my rosacea and eczema flair up.

reviews.headline: best AM facial moisturizer
reviews.comments:
there's a lot to like about this. I am diabetic so dry skin is a constant problem for me and I am very sensory sensitive, most lotion is difficult for me to use because of how it feels. 

This lotion absorbs fast, it's a gel so it's very lightweight, it doesn't leave that weird slimy feel that most lotions do, AND it's really helped my skin improve it's actual health. I use this during the day and at night I use the renewing one. That combination works the best of literally any facial lotion I've ever used.

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and sweat a lot. I use this in the AM and PM paired with retinol, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and vitamin c serum. this is light enough to apply before SPF without feeli g too heavy.

reviews.headline: Perfect for year-round
reviews.comments: Another good skincare product! The only downside is when you get down to the end, you can't really tell if you've used it all or not, so I keep pumping it.

reviews.headline: Terrible reaction
reviews.comments: I have been Cerave moisturizing cream for years as it has been the only cream that has worked for my dry eczema prone skin, so I thought I would give this a try. I have combination skin that is more on the oily side. I liked the texture and feel of this product. Unfortunately I ended up having a terrible reaction to it - red bumps all over my face. :(

reviews.headline: Light and moisterizing
reviews.comments: I like that it's super light and does add a lot of moisture.  It also doesn't have sunscreen, which is what I was looking for.  (I always wear sunscreen outside, but if I'm just going to be inside at the office, I'd rather not have it.)  It's a little pricey for the volume.  Because it's the thick plastic tube, you think you're getting more than you are.  Mine is depleting quickly.  I also wish it had different packaging in general, environmentally.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I have used this for almost a year now and my skin loves it!   My skin is very dry and sensitive, so I can only use certain products.    This is an awesome product, it helps with dryness and is not heavy or greasy.  Your skin can still breathe after using this, it's so light and refreshing.

reviews.headline: love this one for daily use
reviews.comments:
this might be my favorite cerave moisturizer. i first tried it in May this year alongside another new product Vanicream Vitamin C. all summer this was my favorite combo.
vanicream vitamin c + cerave gel moisturizer + hero cosmetics force shield spf. 

it made my sensitive, skin happy all summer. I'm going to keep it going the rest of the year.

reviews.headline: Works Great!
reviews.comments: Great, light weight moisturizer for summer months.  Non greasy, and absorbs quickly.  No residue on my hands.  My face feels hydrated and soft all day long.  Would highly recommend and I plan to re-purchase for next summer!  (I need something heavier for winter months as I have very dry skin).

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I enjoy this product - I feel like it does moisturize my face, and I love how it makes my skin feel. However, I feel like it could be just a little better. I find I need to use more than one pump, and I don't understand why I should need to use that much moisturizer. It does work, though. I'm curious to see how long the tube lasts!

reviews.headline: I dont like
reviews.comments: Evryone seems to like this but i really dont it burns when i put it on and i feel like it may be worsening my acne im going to try the cera ve pm moisturizer and am one and hopefully those r better

reviews.headline: I love this stuff sm
reviews.comments: I hate feeling greasy. This moisturizer really penetrates my skin and leaves it feeling soft and good!! I cannot stress this enough, I have tried soo many moisturizers and I really like this one a lot.

reviews.headline: just ok
reviews.comments: moisturizing but doesn't sit well under sunscreen or foundation...pills up.

reviews.headline: Really disappointed..
reviews.comments: I bought this because of all the positive reviews but man I am disappointed‚Ä¶ I liked the feeling of the product itself but it did not moisturize my skin and burned when applying it. It also pills WITH other cerave products which shocked me.

reviews.headline: Two thumbs up
reviews.comments: I have tried so many face moisturizers and they are always heavy feeling on my face and i live in Florida and i usually feel a layer of sweat beads. This moisturizer doesnt feel like that and my face feels soft! This is my new favorite moisturizer for sure!

reviews.headline: Another cera ve slay
reviews.comments: I bought this and a la roche posay one- this one wins! It doesnt pill under makeup, its lightweight, and doesnt smell at all. I dont think its oil free based on the packaging, but it doesnt feel oily. I switched from the cream tub for the winter weather and to this for summer with the humidity and oiliness. I like the lid as well as it stands up in my medicine cabindt

reviews.headline: Great for oily skin!
reviews.comments: I have very oily skin, especially in my T zone. I love this. Ive been using it for about 1 year now currently on my second bottle. Its very light and doesnt leave my skin feeling full of oil throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Love the product and the packaging
reviews.comments: I've been using this moisturizer daily for months now. It doesn't leave residue or a sticky feeling on my skin. The packaging is also great. We've all had to cut the ends off of our products in tubes to get out every last bit. That is NOT the case with this one. Mine is VERY near empty and the product is still coming out with the pump!

reviews.headline: amazing üëè
reviews.comments: I have spent soooo much money on a moisturizer for my oily skin. I tried this product and I am hooked!! it's soooo good!!! I highly recommend!!!

media.caption: Keep your skin fresh and hydrated with CeraVe's Ultra-Light moisturizing gel

media.headline: Love this product!
media.caption: After unboxing my product. Simple, but informative packaging.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently started using the Ultra-Light Moisturizing Gel, and I'm genuinely impressed with its performance. As someone with combination skin, finding the right balance between hydration and avoiding a greasy feel has been a challenge. This gel has been a game-changer for me.

Texture and Absorption: The gel texture is incredibly lightweight, and it absorbs almost instantly upon application. It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated without any residue. It's perfect for those who prefer a non-greasy moisturizer.

Hydration: Despite its light texture, this moisturizing gel provides ample hydration. It's been particularly effective in keeping my skin moisturized throughout the day, even in dry environments.

Versatility: I appreciate its versatility. It works well as a standalone moisturizer or as a base for makeup. Plus, it's suitable for both daytime and nighttime use.

Ingredients: Checking the ingredient list, I noticed it contains hydrating elements like hyaluronic acid, which my skin loves. It's also free from common irritants, making it suitable for sensitive skin types.

Packaging: The packaging is convenient, with a pump dispenser that ensures hygienic and controlled application.

Scent: One thing worth noting is that it's generally fragrance-free, which is a big plus for those with sensitive skin or a preference for fragrance-free products.

Overall, the Ultra-Light Moisturizing Gel has become a staple in my skincare routine. It strikes the perfect balance between hydration and a lightweight, non-greasy feel. If you're looking for a versatile and effective moisturizer, especially for combination or oily skin, I highly recommend giving this product a try.
faceoff_positive.headline: I highly recommend giving this product a try.

faceoff_negative.comments:
I recently tried out the CeraVe Ultra Light Moisturizing Gel, and while it had some impressive qualities, it ultimately fell short in addressing my dry skin's needs.

One thing I immediately loved about this moisturizer is its texture. It goes on incredibly smoothly, almost like a cooling gel, and feels refreshing on the skin. It's also worth noting that this product is not sticky at all, which is a huge plus for me. Many moisturizers can leave your skin feeling tacky or heavy, but that was not the case with this one. It's perfect for those who prefer a lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer.

Moreover, the moisturizer has a soothing effect on the skin, which is particularly pleasant, especially if you have sensitive skin. It didn't cause any irritation or breakouts, which is always a plus.

However, the major drawback for me was its longevity. Despite its initial hydrating feel, it simply did not provide the all-day moisture that my dry skin craves. I found myself having to reapply it mid-day to prevent that uncomfortable dryness from returning. While this might work well for those with normal or slightly dry skin, it's not sufficient for someone with persistent dryness.

In conclusion, the CeraVe Ultra Light Moisturizing Gel is a product with a lot of potential. It feels great on the skin, is non-sticky, and offers a soothing experience. However, its inability to provide lasting hydration makes it less suitable for individuals with dry skin types like mine. If you have more balanced or oily skin, this product might work better for you, but for those seeking long-lasting moisture, you might need to explore other options.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice feeling going on, but didn't last all day
